introduction.title: About Me
description: I'm a Java Developer with 4 years of experience, passionate about building scalable and high-performing backend systems. I love solving complex backend challenges, designing efficient microservices, and improving application performance.
I strongly believe in continuous learning and collaboration, which is why I'm currently diving deeper into System Design principles and exploring React to expand my technical skill set.

coreValues.title: Continuous Learning
coreValues.description: Always open to discussions on Java, backend development, and system design. Let's connect and learn from each other!

coreValues.title: Collaboration
coreValues.description: Believing in continuous learning and collaboration.
